languages.text: {n}Хейнрикс несколько секунд молчит. Затем заглядывает вам глаза:{/n} "Позвольте быть откровенны, {name}... вы удивительны. Неповторимы. Не только в силу своего особого положения, сколько в силу..." {n}Он запинается.{/n} "Я благодарен Богу-Императору, что долг перед ним привел меня в вашу свиту. И за то, что у меня есть возможность... быть рядом с вами. Поверьте, невзирая на мою... специфическую роль при вас, я искренне хочу оградить вас от... напрасных переживаний".

{n}Heinrix is silent for a few seconds. Then he looks into your eyes.{/n} "Let me be frank, {name}... you are remarkable. Unique. Not only by virtue of your special position, but by virtue of..." {n}He hesitates.{/n} "I am grateful to the God-Emperor that my duty to Him has brought me into your retinue. And that I have had the chance... to be near you. Believe me, despite the... particular role I must play here, I do sincerely want to spare you... any unnecessary distress."

Не только в силу своего особого положения, сколько в силу..." {n}Он запинается.{/n} "Я благодарен Богу-Императору, что долг перед ним привел меня в вашу свиту. И за то, что у меня есть возможность... быть рядом с вами. Поверьте, невзирая на мою... специфическую роль при вас, я искренне хочу оградить вас от... напрасных переживаний".

And that I have had the chance... to be near you. Believe me, despite the... particular role I must play here, I do sincerely want to spare you... any unnecessary distress."

languages.text: {n}Heinrix guarda silencio durante unos instantes. Luego te mira a los ojos.{/n} «Hablaré con franqueza, {name}... eres {mf|extraordinario|extraordinaria}. {mf|Único|Única}. Y no lo digo solo por tu posición, sino en virtud de...». {n}Titubea.{/n} «Doy gracias al Dios Emperador por el hecho de que mi deber para con Él me haya conducido hasta tu séquito. Y por haber tenido la oportunidad de... estar junto a ti. Créeme, a pesar de la labor tan... particular que he de desempeñar aquí, deseo de corazón no causarte ninguna... molestia innecesaria».
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix is silent for a few seconds. Then he looks into your eyes.{/n} "Let me be frank, {name}... you are remarkable. Unique. Not only by virtue of your special position, but by virtue of..." {n}He hesitates.{/n} "I am grateful to the God-Emperor that my duty to Him has brought me into your retinue. And that I have had the chance... to be near you. Believe me, despite the... particular role I must play here, I do sincerely want to spare you... any unnecessary distress."

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix guarda silencio durante unos instantes. Luego te mira a los ojos.{/n} «Hablaré con franqueza, {name}... eres {mf|extraordinario|extraordinaria}. {mf|Único|Única}. Y no lo digo solo por tu posición, sino en virtud de...». {n}Titubea.{/n} «Doy gracias al Dios Emperador por el hecho de que mi deber para con Él me haya conducido hasta tu séquito. Y por haber tenido la oportunidad de... estar junto a ti. Créeme, a pesar de la labor tan... particular que he de desempeñar aquí, deseo de corazón no causarte ninguna... molestia innecesaria».
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: {n}ハインリックスは数秒間、押し黙った。そして、こちらの目を見る。{/n}「率直に言おう、{name}…あなたは素晴らしい、唯一無二の人だ。それは特別な立場にいるからではなく、あなた自身が…」{n}彼は躊躇した。{/n}「神帝陛下への義務により、あなたの従者になれたことを感謝している。そして、そばに… いられる機会が得られたということも。俺はここで…特別な役割を果たさなければならないが、心からあなたを助けたいと思っている… 不必要な苦痛は与えたくない」
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix is silent for a few seconds. Then he looks into your eyes.{/n} "Let me be frank, {name}... you are remarkable. Unique. Not only by virtue of your special position, but by virtue of..." {n}He hesitates.{/n} "I am grateful to the God-Emperor that my duty to Him has brought me into your retinue. And that I have had the chance... to be near you. Believe me, despite the... particular role I must play here, I do sincerely want to spare you... any unnecessary distress."

traits.locale_text: {n}ハインリックスは数秒間、押し黙った。そして、こちらの目を見る。{/n}「率直に言おう、{name}…あなたは素晴らしい、唯一無二の人だ。それは特別な立場にいるからではなく、あなた自身が…」{n}彼は躊躇した。{/n}「神帝陛下への義務により、あなたの従者になれたことを感謝している。そして、そばに… いられる機会が得られたということも。俺はここで…特別な役割を果たさなければならないが、心からあなたを助けたいと思っている… 不必要な苦痛は与えたくない」
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: {n}海因里希沉默了几秒钟，随后看着你的双眼。{/n}“实话实说，{name}……你既出色，又与众不同。这并不仅是因为你的特殊地位，还因为……”{n}他犹豫片刻。{/n}“我很感激神皇，正是因为我对祂的职责，才将我加入了你的行伍，有机会……待在你身边。请相信我说的话，尽管……我在不得不扮演某个特别的角色，但我真的很想让你……免受一切不必要的痛苦。”
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix is silent for a few seconds. Then he looks into your eyes.{/n} "Let me be frank, {name}... you are remarkable. Unique. Not only by virtue of your special position, but by virtue of..." {n}He hesitates.{/n} "I am grateful to the God-Emperor that my duty to Him has brought me into your retinue. And that I have had the chance... to be near you. Believe me, despite the... particular role I must play here, I do sincerely want to spare you... any unnecessary distress."

traits.locale_text: {n}海因里希沉默了几秒钟，随后看着你的双眼。{/n}“实话实说，{name}……你既出色，又与众不同。这并不仅是因为你的特殊地位，还因为……”{n}他犹豫片刻。{/n}“我很感激神皇，正是因为我对祂的职责，才将我加入了你的行伍，有机会……待在你身边。请相信我说的话，尽管……我在不得不扮演某个特别的角色，但我真的很想让你……免受一切不必要的痛苦。”
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: {n}Heinrix reste silencieux quelques secondes, puis plonge son regard dans le vôtre.{/n} « Laissez-moi vous parler franchement, {name}... Vous êtes quelqu'un de remarquable. D'unique, même. Non seulement du fait de votre position particulière, mais aussi de... » {n}Il hésite un instant.{/n} « Je suis reconnaissant à l'Empereur-Dieu que mon devoir m'ait amené à me joindre à votre entourage et que j'aie eu la chance... de me retrouver près de vous. Croyez-moi, malgré le rôle... particulier que je dois jouer ici, je tiens sincèrement à vous épargner toute... détresse inutile. »
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix is silent for a few seconds. Then he looks into your eyes.{/n} "Let me be frank, {name}... you are remarkable. Unique. Not only by virtue of your special position, but by virtue of..." {n}He hesitates.{/n} "I am grateful to the God-Emperor that my duty to Him has brought me into your retinue. And that I have had the chance... to be near you. Believe me, despite the... particular role I must play here, I do sincerely want to spare you... any unnecessary distress."

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix reste silencieux quelques secondes, puis plonge son regard dans le vôtre.{/n} « Laissez-moi vous parler franchement, {name}... Vous êtes quelqu'un de remarquable. D'unique, même. Non seulement du fait de votre position particulière, mais aussi de... » {n}Il hésite un instant.{/n} « Je suis reconnaissant à l'Empereur-Dieu que mon devoir m'ait amené à me joindre à votre entourage et que j'aie eu la chance... de me retrouver près de vous. Croyez-moi, malgré le rôle... particulier que je dois jouer ici, je tiens sincèrement à vous épargner toute... détresse inutile. »
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: {n}Heinrix schweigt einige Sekunden. Dann sieht er in deine Augen.{/n} "Ich will ganz offen sein, {name} ... Ihr seid erstaunlich. Einzigartig. Nicht nur wegen Eurer besonderen Stellung, sondern wegen ..." {n}Er zögert.{/n} "Ich bin dem Gottimperator dankbar, dass meine Pflicht ihm gegenüber mich in Euer Gefolge geführt hat. Und dass ich die Chance hatte ... in Eurer Nähe zu sein. Glaubt mir, trotz der ... besonderen Rolle, die ich hier spielen muss, will ich Euch ... unnötigen Kummer ersparen, von ganzem Herzen."
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix is silent for a few seconds. Then he looks into your eyes.{/n} "Let me be frank, {name}... you are remarkable. Unique. Not only by virtue of your special position, but by virtue of..." {n}He hesitates.{/n} "I am grateful to the God-Emperor that my duty to Him has brought me into your retinue. And that I have had the chance... to be near you. Believe me, despite the... particular role I must play here, I do sincerely want to spare you... any unnecessary distress."

Nicht nur wegen Eurer besonderen Stellung, sondern wegen ..." {n}Er zögert.{/n} "Ich bin dem Gottimperator dankbar, dass meine Pflicht ihm gegenüber mich in Euer Gefolge geführt hat. Und dass ich die Chance hatte ... in Eurer Nähe zu sein. Glaubt mir, trotz der ... besonderen Rolle, die ich hier spielen muss, will ich Euch ... unnötigen Kummer ersparen, von ganzem Herzen."

Not only by virtue of your special position, but by virtue of..." {n}He hesitates.{/n} "I am grateful to the God-Emperor that my duty to Him has brought me into your retinue. And that I have had the chance... to be near you. Believe me, despite the... particular role I must play here, I do sincerely want to spare you... any unnecessary distress."

languages.text: {n}Heinrix, birkaç saniyeliğine susuyor. Ardından gözlerinin içine bakıyor.{/n} "Açık konuşayım {name}... Sen harikasın. Başkasın. Sırf mevkinden dolayı da değil, aynı zamanda..." {n}Tereddüt ediyor.{/n} "Vazifem beni maiyetine getirdiği için... Yanında olma şansına eriştiğim için Tanrı İmparator'a şükrediyorum. Burada üstlenmiş olduğum role karşın... Seni her türlü gereksiz sıkıntıdan sakınmak isterim, inan."
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix is silent for a few seconds. Then he looks into your eyes.{/n} "Let me be frank, {name}... you are remarkable. Unique. Not only by virtue of your special position, but by virtue of..." {n}He hesitates.{/n} "I am grateful to the God-Emperor that my duty to Him has brought me into your retinue. And that I have had the chance... to be near you. Believe me, despite the... particular role I must play here, I do sincerely want to spare you... any unnecessary distress."

Sırf mevkinden dolayı da değil, aynı zamanda..." {n}Tereddüt ediyor.{/n} "Vazifem beni maiyetine getirdiği için... Yanında olma şansına eriştiğim için Tanrı İmparator'a şükrediyorum. Burada üstlenmiş olduğum role karşın... Seni her türlü gereksiz sıkıntıdan sakınmak isterim, inan."
